summary:
People acting dumb saying "well a bunch of other people's names aren't on the poster either." 🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄
Let me clarify it for you....
body:
People acting dumb saying “well a bunch of other people’s names aren’t on the poster either.” 🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄

Let me clarify it for you. Out of all of the people who’s photo is presented on the poster, Danai’s name is the ONLY ONE not listed at the top. Everyone who’s pictured had their name listed at the top expect for her. She was given small ass print at the bottom as if she was one of the characters left off the poster. Meanwhile, her picture is bigger than Nebula’s.

If her character isn’t important then why even put her picture on the poster? You could’ve left her off and just put her name at the bottom like some of the others. It’s rude af and disrespectful.

The same ones who think nothing’s wrong with this or think black people just want something to be mad about are the same ones who got offended when Brie Larson said more POC and woman should be on the press tour instead of the same white men we always see. I’m sure they’re mad Danai and Don Cheadle are even on the poster to begin with.

Meanwhile, her picture is bigger than Nebula’s.

If her character isn’t important then why even put her picture on the poster? You could’ve left her off and just put her name at the bottom like some of the others. It’s rude af and disrespectful.

The same ones who think nothing’s wrong with this or think black people just want something to be mad about are the same ones who got offended when Brie Larson said more POC and woman should be on the press tour instead of the same white men we always see. I’m sure they’re mad Danai and Don Cheadle are even on the poster to begin with.

Everyone who’s pictured had their name listed at the top expect for her. She was given small ass print at the bottom as if she was one of the characters left off the poster. Meanwhile, her picture is bigger than Nebula’s.

If her character isn’t important then why even put her picture on the poster? You could’ve left her off and just put her name at the bottom like some of the others. It’s rude af and disrespectful.

The same ones who think nothing’s wrong with this or think black people just want something to be mad about are the same ones who got offended when Brie Larson said more POC and woman should be on the press tour instead of the same white men we always see. I’m sure they’re mad Danai and Don Cheadle are even on the poster to begin with.

summary: Do you know what’s the most annoying thing about people complaining how Carol isn’t ‘Carol’ in the Endgame trailer? The Russo’s...
body:
Do you know what’s the most annoying thing about people complaining how Carol isn’t ‘Carol’ in the Endgame trailer?

The Russo’s made a special effort to ask the actors how their characters would do something as they’re fully aware that they didn’t help create them and they don’t know them as well as the actor themselves. So I highly doubt they just said to Brie, ‘hey you’re gonna get all dolled up now, kay.’

Also she’s wearing a fucking tank top and some lipstick, get over it, jfc. You saw one film with her in where she’s essentially re-discovering herself, you don’t know what Carol Danvers likes to wear.

Plus did you see what they did with Black Widow in Infinity War? It was the first time I actually liked her because she was wearing sensible armour (ie. no tits out) and wasn’t sexualised for once. I can’t imagine them suddenly demanding that Captain Marvel look ‘more feminine’.

reblog.comment:

Also she’s wearing a fucking tank top and some lipstick, get over it, jfc. You saw one film with her in where she’s essentially re-discovering herself, you don’t know what Carol Danvers likes to wear.

Plus did you see what they did with Black Widow in Infinity War? It was the first time I actually liked her because she was wearing sensible armour (ie. no tits out) and wasn’t sexualised for once. I can’t imagine them suddenly demanding that Captain Marvel look ‘more feminine’.

The Russo’s made a special effort to ask the actors how their characters would do something as they’re fully aware that they didn’t help create them and they don’t know them as well as the actor themselves. So I highly doubt they just said to Brie, ‘hey you’re gonna get all dolled up now, kay.’

blog.description:
Erika Born in 1992
Homestuck, MtG, Warhammer, MLP, Warframe, Persona, Mass Effect, One Piece, Comics, other fandoms and Egalitarian ramblings 
Political shit tagged "Social Justice" , Recent Homestuck spoilers tagged "Upd8", and One Piece spoilers are tagged as  "OP spoilers" though I only tag them for recent manga chapters. Steven Universe spoilers tagged as "SU spoilers" and RWBY gets "rwby spoilers".Anything else gets just as "spoilers" I tag nsfw as such, though anything beyond a tasteful pinup gets tagged "explicit" as well.
 LIst of fandoms I will get involved in here
http://pious-smasher.tumblr.com/post/173803693568/list-of-fandoms-i-will-get-involved-in-the-drama

summary: !!!! Captain Marvel spoilers Captain Marvel spoliers!!!!
body:
!!!! Captain Marvel spoilers Captain Marvel spoliers!!!!

okay, so… i’ve been thinking a lot about the Tesseract since i saw Cap Marvel because something didn’t seem right…

And i just realised, didn’t SHIELD finally get back the Tesseract up until they discovered Steve in the ice (about 2010-2011)?? It was in the ship, right? And in Avengers is when Loki infiltrates into SHIELD and gets a hold of it…

So how the fuck could it be in a space station in the 90s??
